name: Recent Related Post And Page
author: Weblizar

sections.description:
Recent Related Post And Page Plugin Display the post, page with beautifully designs and layouts. This plugin offer the 2 options to display the posts and page content, using shortcode & widget on your WordPress sites.

It offer the simple way to increase revenue and increase engagement on your WordPress Post, pages by helping your users find great related content using this Plugin!. Related posts can increase your post views, help users find older content that’s still relevant, and keep your audience on your site for longer by helping them discover the right content at the right time

Using [RRPP id=123] shortcode, you can publish recent, related post & pages using plugin shortcode or widget feature. Simply copy & paste the plugin shortcode into any Page or Post in your WordPress sites.

You can activate recent and related posts/pages widget into any widget area.

Features

  • Show Related Posts
  • Show Recent Posts
  • Show Related Pages
  • Show Recent Pages
  • Show Related Pages & Post Using Shortcode & Widget
  • Live Preview
  • Two Templates Design
  • General Fonts
  • Color Customizations
  • Custom CSS Style

Free Plugin Demo: Recent Related Post & Page

Recent Related Post And Page Pro Features

  • Fully Responsive Plugin Design
  • 8 Design Templates
  • 500+ General & Google Fonts
  • Multiple Customizations Setting
  • Show Related Posts
  • Show Recent Posts
  • Show Related Pages
  • Show Recent Pages
  • Show Related Pages & Post Using Shortcode & Widget
  • Show Recent Related Posts And Pages
  • Live Preview in Admin Dashboard
  • Custom CSS Style

Check Demos

  • Recent Related Post And Page Pro – Live Demo
  • Recent Related Post And Page Pro – Admin Demo
  • Upgrade To Recent Related Post And Page Pro

sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire recent-related-post-and-page folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Widgets in Appearance Menu and activate widget.
sections.faq: Please use WordPress support forum to ask any query regarding any issue.

sections.reviews:
awesome plugin

By wkasulke on June 7, 2018

it's really an eye-catcher for the visitors and highly configurable. Placeability by shortcode at any place on the sites

Excelent plugin

By Weblizar (weblizar_support) on September 3, 2016

it is good plugin to manage recent post and pages
